title: LFM Silver to make a team to climb to Challenger!
body:
Hi I'm Commando.
I'm looking for 4 other dedicated silver players who want to climb to Challenger.
This is no joke!
Please add me in game if you're interested.

Thank you.

replies.body:
Silver 2 atm, jungle/top main, I'd be interested.
I'm more likely to be challenged than challenger, however.
Good luck getting to challenger. You will need it. And a second life because you would need to have no life to get there.
